shortdesc.ph: Enables built-in encryption with an encryption password before users join a channel.

dlentry.dd: This method is deprecated as of v2.4.0. Please use the method instead.

section.p: Before joining the channel, the App needs to call this method to specify the secret to enable the built-in encryption function. All users in the same channel should set the same secret. The encryption password is automatically cleared once a user leaves the channel. If an encryption password is not specified, the encryption functionality will be disabled.

ul.li: Do not use this method for CDN live streaming.
For optimal transmission, ensure that the encrypted data size does not exceed the original data size + 16 bytes. 16 bytes is the maximum padding size for AES encryption.
